mapper.select: SELECT users_group.users_group_name ,users.user_id ,users.last_name ,users.first_name FROM users_group LEFT JOIN users ON users_group.users_group_id = users.users_group_id WHERE users_group.users_group_id = 1 AND users_group.delete_flag = 0 AND users.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY users.authority_no ASC ,users.created_at ASC
SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND delete_flag = 0 AND updated_at = #{updatedAt}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET delete_flag = 1 ,delete_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND delete_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND (user_id = #{userId} OR email = #{email})
